newsitem.title: USA: TABLE - Dataflex Corp Q1 net, shr rise.
newsitem.headline: TABLE - Dataflex Corp Q1 net, shr rise.

text.p: (All data above 000s except per share numbers)

NOTES: The company attributed the decline in revenues to the sale of its Eastern and Midwestern divisions on October 4, 1996, and the sale of the Education division in April. Excluding the impact of the sale of the Eastern, Midwestern and Education divisions, revenues decreased by $3.2 million from the year-ago period, due to what the company said was a decrease in hardware sales.
